attributes.additional_details:
Vote for unemployed people to pay more than £5 a week towards the cost of raising their children. Children can be expensive and the non resident parent should have to pay more than £5 a week!
The £5 a week we receive pays for one karate lesson that's it. The child also needs food, clothes, swimming lesions, toys the list seams never ending!
Yet as his mother refuses to get a job and sits at home or on holidays happily spending saving, inheritance and racking up credit card bills. While we go without to make sure We can provide the best I can for my child.
Please vote to increase the amount taken by the csa! Thank you.
